methods.description: Access to public facilities (escalators and elevators) in railway stations

parameters.name: stationnumber
parameters.description: Number of the station the facilities belong to.

parameters.name: area
parameters.description: Geo coordinate rectangle in WGS84-format to filter facilities by geographical position. Parameters must be 4 numbers exactly as follows: longitudeWest, latitudeSouth, longitudeEast, latitudeNorth.

methods.description: Returns the facility identified by its equipmentnumber.

parameters.name: equipmentnumber
parameters.description: Equipmentnumber of the facility to fetch.

responses.description: A facility provided by this API is either a public elevator or escalator located at a German railway station.

methods.description: Returns information about a station (and its corresponding facilities) identified by a stationnumber.

parameters.name: stationnumber
parameters.description: Number of the station to fetch.

apiDescription: A RESTful webservice to retrieve data about the operational state of public elevators and escalators in german railway stations.
